---
title: "Week 6: Exponential smoothing"
---

::: {.cell}

:::

## What you will learn this week

* Simple exponential smoothing
* Exponential smoothing methods with trend 

## Pre-class activities

Read [Sections 8.1-8.2 and 8.5 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth.html) and watch all embedded videos

## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial)

Complete Exercises 1-6, 16, 17 from [Section 8.8 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth-exercises.html).
